name: Feed Your Queen
description:
This game was created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 34. Vote for us!
http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=61161

Feed Your Queen! Hunt and gather for your voluptuous lover so that she may grow to her full potential and TAKE OVER THE WORLD.

HOW TO PLAY

- Left click to shoot
- Right click to headbutt
- R to return to Queen
- F to toggle full screen
- WASD to move
- Blue orbs grow your queen
- Red orbs feed her health
